explains: adj. 幽暗的，多阴影的；昏暗的，朦胧的；鲜为人知的，神秘莫测的；虚无的，虚幻的

sentences.en: Someone was waiting in the shadowy doorway.
sentences.cn: 有人守候在昏暗的门口。

sentences.en: I watched him from a shadowy corner.
sentences.cn: 我从一个阴暗的角落观察他。

sentences.en: They made out a shadowy form in front of them.
sentences.cn: 他们隐约认出了前面的模糊人影。
